name: 60 Seconds or Less
description:
Deliver orders as fast as possible! The less time you take, the more money you make.

Devlog video for this game coming out soon! If interested, be sure to subscribe on YouTube - youtube.com/tutmo.

Created for Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3 - All Code, 3D Models, Sprites (Images), Music, and SFX were created from scratch within the game jam's 1-week time limit. The only asset not made from scratch was the font (dafont.com/dimbo.font).

Credits
tutmo (me) - Code, SFX, Music
My Wife / Best Friend - 3D Models, Images, Level Design

Tools
Game Engine - Unity
Music/SFX - FL Studio
3D Models - Blender
Sprites/Images - Photoshop & Procreate
